existing_features.title: Update the Landing page so that clicking the "Access Customer Portal" button navigates directly to the customer "Add Request" form page instead of the Customer Sign In page.
Remove the Customer Sign In page from the app routing and ensure any existing redirects that previously went to "/customer/signin" instead route users to the customer request page.
Update the post-submit success screen in the Customer Request flow so that the primary return action does not send users to a page that requires the removed sign-in flow.

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove the intermediate page; clicking 'Access Customer Portal' should navigate directly to the 'Add Request' page
